examples: An unexpected surge in electrical power caused the computer to crash.

definitions.definition: a sudden and great movement forward:
examples: At the end of the game, there was a surge of fans onto the field.

definitions.definition: a sudden increase of an emotion:
examples: She was overwhelmed by a surge of remorse.
An angry crowd surged through the gates of the president's palace.

definitions.definition: (of an emotion) to develop strongly and quickly:
examples: She felt a wave of resentment surging (up) inside her.
